yes indeed kochira koso. If I am not mistaken,saito killed them all. being, after all, the
shinsengumi spy that hijikata sama sent in to deal with them. I believe he lured them in by
pretending to be a lush and not adverse to stealing sake to the endearment of the group.

But if you want to be all technical, in the beginning, it was the forced seppuku of the defected
vice chief sannan or  Yamanami Seisuke. after he attempted to leave the group, hijikata sent okita
sama to "be his second". The forced seppuku proablye came as no surprise to him in the
end.hijikata wrote the rules of the shinsengumi,but he hardly objected at the time., but  Toudou
Heisuke  i am sure, felt more betrayed.since he was one of the originals with okita, yamanami,
hijikata and koundo; before they were even  called the shinsengumi.
the other saw it as a power grab demonstrated by their lecherous deeds.
